metadata.title: CVE-2020-18670 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulneraibility in Roundcube mail .4.4 viadatabase host and user in /installer/test.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
